did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Five letters to W. F. Burditt concerning the Town Planning Commission in Canada; pamphlets by Adams.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Adams was involved with the Garden City movement in England, especially Letchworth. He served as Town Planning Advisor to the Canadian government, 1914-1921, and presided over the Regional Plan of New York and Its Environs until its completion in 1931.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Five letters to W. F. Burditt concerning the Town Planning Commission in Canada; pamphlets by Adams.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Thomas Adams. Papers, #2731. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Five letters to W. F. Burditt concerning the Town Planning Commission in Canada; pamphlets by Adams.
